languages.text: В тот миг на палубе ни у кого не было сомнений, что навигация внутри погибшего корабля будет сложна. Отряды разделят километры искореженного металла, мертвых отсеков без атмосферы, заваленных коридоров или пробоин в обшивке размером с дом. Только тонкая нить {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-связи протянется между храбрецами.

traits.locale_text: В тот миг на палубе ни у кого не было сомнений, что навигация внутри погибшего корабля будет сложна. Отряды разделят километры искореженного металла, мертвых отсеков без атмосферы, заваленных коридоров или пробоин в обшивке размером с дом. Только тонкая нить вокс-связи протянется между храбрецами.

languages.text: No one on deck was in any doubt that navigating inside the wrecked ship would be difficult. The units would be separated by kilometres of twisted metal, dead modules devoid of atmosphere, collapsed passageways, and hull breaches the size of a house. The only thing connecting the brave teams would be the delicate thread of a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-link.

Отряды разделят километры искореженного металла, мертвых отсеков без атмосферы, заваленных коридоров или пробоин в обшивке размером с дом. Только тонкая нить {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-связи протянется между храбрецами.

traits.locale_text: No one on deck was in any doubt that navigating inside the wrecked ship would be difficult. The units would be separated by kilometers of twisted metal, dead modules devoid of atmosphere, collapsed passageways, and hull breaches the size of a house. The only thing connecting the brave teams would be the delicate thread of a vox-link.

The only thing connecting the brave teams would be the delicate thread of a vox-link.

The only thing connecting the brave teams would be the delicate thread of a vox-link.

No one on deck was in any doubt that navigating inside the wrecked ship would be difficult. The units would be separated by kilometres of twisted metal, dead modules devoid of atmosphere, collapsed passageways, and hull breaches the size of a house. The only thing connecting the brave teams would be the delicate thread of a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-link.

languages.text: Todos a bordo sabían que explorar la nave a la deriva sería difícil. Las unidades estarían separadas por kilómetros de metal retorcido, módulos muertos sin atmósfera, pasillos derrumbados y brechas en el casco por las que cabría una casa. La única conexión entre los equipos de valientes sería el delicado cable de un {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g}enlace.
languages.original_text: No one on deck was in any doubt that navigating inside the wrecked ship would be difficult. The units would be separated by kilometres of twisted metal, dead modules devoid of atmosphere, collapsed passageways, and hull breaches the size of a house. The only thing connecting the brave teams would be the delicate thread of a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-link.

traits.locale_text: Todos a bordo sabían que explorar la nave a la deriva sería difícil. Las unidades estarían separadas por kilómetros de metal retorcido, módulos muertos sin atmósfera, pasillos derrumbados y brechas en el casco por las que cabría una casa. La única conexión entre los equipos de valientes sería el delicado cable de un {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g}enlace.

languages.text: 甲板上所有人都心知肚明，探索这艘残破的飞船会很困难。几支探索队将会各自为战。横亘在他们之间的，会有长达几公里的扭曲金属、缺乏氧气的死亡区域、坍塌的通道、以及像房屋一样巨大的船体缺口。这几支勇士小队之间唯一的通讯方式，就是{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}连接这种若有若无的联系。
languages.original_text: No one on deck was in any doubt that navigating inside the wrecked ship would be difficult. The units would be separated by kilometres of twisted metal, dead modules devoid of atmosphere, collapsed passageways, and hull breaches the size of a house. The only thing connecting the brave teams would be the delicate thread of a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-link.

traits.locale_text: 甲板上所有人都心知肚明，探索这艘残破的飞船会很困难。几支探索队将会各自为战。横亘在他们之间的，会有长达几公里的扭曲金属、缺乏氧气的死亡区域、坍塌的通道、以及像房屋一样巨大的船体缺口。这几支勇士小队之间唯一的通讯方式，就是{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}连接这种若有若无的联系。

languages.text: デッキの誰も、難破船の中を進むことが困難だとは考えもしなかった。部隊は何キロにも渡るねじれた金属、空気の全く入ってない破損したモジュール、崩壊した通路、家ほどの大きさの船体に開いた穴ではぐれてしまいかねない。勇敢なチームを結び付けるのは、{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}リンクの繊細な糸だけだった。
languages.original_text: No one on deck was in any doubt that navigating inside the wrecked ship would be difficult. The units would be separated by kilometres of twisted metal, dead modules devoid of atmosphere, collapsed passageways, and hull breaches the size of a house. The only thing connecting the brave teams would be the delicate thread of a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-link.

traits.locale_text: デッキの誰も、難破船の中を進むことが困難だとは考えもしなかった。部隊は何キロにも渡るねじれた金属、空気の全く入ってない破損したモジュール、崩壊した通路、家ほどの大きさの船体に開いた穴ではぐれてしまいかねない。勇敢なチームを結び付けるのは、{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}リンクの繊細な糸だけだった。

languages.text: Niemand an Deck zweifelte daran, dass die Navigation im Inneren des Schiffswracks schwierig werden würde. Die Einheiten würden durch Kilometer von verformtem Metall, toten Modulen ohne Atmosphäre, eingestürzten Gängen und Löchern im Rumpf von der Größe eines Hauses getrennt sein. Die einzige Verbindung der tapferen Teams würde ein empfindlicher {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}-Link sein.
languages.original_text: No one on deck was in any doubt that navigating inside the wrecked ship would be difficult. The units would be separated by kilometres of twisted metal, dead modules devoid of atmosphere, collapsed passageways, and hull breaches the size of a house. The only thing connecting the brave teams would be the delicate thread of a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-link.

traits.locale_text: Niemand an Deck zweifelte daran, dass die Navigation im Inneren des Schiffswracks schwierig werden würde. Die Einheiten würden durch Kilometer von verformtem Metall, toten Modulen ohne Atmosphäre, eingestürzten Gängen und Löchern im Rumpf von der Größe eines Hauses getrennt sein. Die einzige Verbindung der tapferen Teams würde ein empfindlicher {g|Encyclopedia:Vox{/g}Vox{mf|-Link sein.

languages.text: Personne sur le pont n'imaginait que l'exploration de l'épave serait une promenade de santé. Les unités seraient séparées par des kilomètres de métal déformé, des modules morts sans atmosphère, des couloirs effondrés et des brèches de la taille d'une maison dans le fuselage. Une seule chose permettrait aux trois vaillantes équipes de garder le contact : la connexion délicate d'une liaison-{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.
languages.original_text: No one on deck was in any doubt that navigating inside the wrecked ship would be difficult. The units would be separated by kilometres of twisted metal, dead modules devoid of atmosphere, collapsed passageways, and hull breaches the size of a house. The only thing connecting the brave teams would be the delicate thread of a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-link.

traits.locale_text: Personne sur le pont n'imaginait que l'exploration de l'épave serait une promenade de santé. Les unités seraient séparées par des kilomètres de métal déformé, des modules morts sans atmosphère, des couloirs effondrés et des brèches de la taille d'une maison dans le fuselage. Une seule chose permettrait aux trois vaillantes équipes de garder le contact : la connexion délicate d'une liaison-{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.

languages.text: Gemideki herkes, enkazı keşfetmenin zor olacağının farkındaydı. Birimlerin arasında kilometrelerce mesafe olacaktı. Bükülmüş metaller, atmosfer yoksunu ölü modüller, harabeye dönmüş geçitler ve evden hâllice oyukların, birimleri ayıracağına hiç şüphe yoktu. Bu gözü pek takımları birbirine bağlayan tek şey, cılız mı cılız bir {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g} hattı olacaktı.
languages.original_text: No one on deck was in any doubt that navigating inside the wrecked ship would be difficult. The units would be separated by kilometres of twisted metal, dead modules devoid of atmosphere, collapsed passageways, and hull breaches the size of a house. The only thing connecting the brave teams would be the delicate thread of a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-link.

traits.locale_text: Gemideki herkes, enkazı keşfetmenin zor olacağının farkındaydı. Birimlerin arasında kilometrelerce mesafe olacaktı. Bükülmüş metaller, atmosfer yoksunu ölü modüller, harabeye dönmüş geçitler ve evden hâllice oyukların, birimleri ayıracağına hiç şüphe yoktu. Bu gözü pek takımları birbirine bağlayan tek şey, cılız mı cılız bir {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g} bağlantısı olacaktı.
